scripts.deploy:test-integral:holesky: npm run prepare:deploy holesky test-integral && npm run codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-test-integral-holesky -l 0.0.33
scripts.deploy:silverswap:sonic: npm run prepare:deploy sonic silverswap && npm run codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-silverswap-sonic -l 0.0.8
scripts.deploy:fibonacci:form: npm run prepare:deploy form fibonacci && npm run codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-fibonacci-form -l 0.0.9 --node https://formapi.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://formapi.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs
scripts.deploy:swapr:gnosis: npm run prepare:deploy gnosis swapr && npm run codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-swapr-gnosis -l 0.0.17
scripts.deploy:hydrex:base: npm run prepare:deploy base hydrex && npm run codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-hydrex-base -l 0.0.1
